mapper.select: select s.sch_no, emp_no, s.cg_no, cg_color, cg_name, sign, sch_name, sch_start, sch_end, sch_content, s.step_no, step_name, step from schedule s join sch_step ss on s.step_no = ss.step_no join sch_cg sc on s.cg_no = sc.cg_no where s.emp_no=#{emp_no} order by step asc

select s.sch_no, emp_no, s.cg_no, cg_color, cg_name, sign, sch_name, sch_start, sch_end, sch_content, s.step_no, step_name, step from schedule s join sch_step ss on s.step_no = ss.step_no join sch_cg sc on s.cg_no = sc.cg_no where sch_no=#{sch_no}

select emp_no, position_no, low_dept_no, salary, emp_name, birth, pic, email, cell_phone, emp_tel, emp_break, cg_no from emp where emp_no in (select p.emp_no from schedule s join sch_people p on s.sch_no = p.sch_no where s.emp_no=#{emp_no})
mapper.update: update schedule set cg_no = (select cg_no from sch_cg where cg_name=#{cg_name}), sign = #{sign} , sch_name =#{sch_name}, sch_start=#{sch_start}, sch_end=#{sch_end}, sch_content=#{sch_content} where sch_no=#{sch_no}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(sch_no, emp_no, cg_no, sign, sch_name, sch_start, sch_end, sch_content, step_no) values(SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emp_no}, (select cg_no from sch_cg where cg_name=#{cg_name}), #{sign}, #{sch_name}, #{sch_start}, #{sch_end}, #{sch_content}, (select step_no from sch_step where step_name=#{step_name}))
mapper.delete: delete sch_people where sch_no=#{sch_no} and emp_no=#{emp_no}
